title: Biden’s Boost to Competition Promises Long-Run Gains
itunes:title: Biden’s Boost to Competition Promises Long-Run Gains
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses the cevolution of the Covid-19 virus. Bloomberg News Department of Justice Reporter David McLaughlin shares details of President Biden's executive order to boost competition across U.S. industries. Bloomberg News Reporter Ed Ludlow provides a preview of the Virgin Galactic space launch. And we Drive to the Close with Nadia Lovell, Senior U.S. Equity Strategist, UBS Global Wealth Management

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
